column4: hello all - I'm looking for information on corporate gnome/ubuntu deployments. I need info on prestaging user environments, automated installations. Does anyone over here has users on linux on an ad domain? Can someone point me to a correct channel? thx
sure Windows server and Linux servers could work together.  ,but Windows server hum I woudn't use that :)
what you want to know is not distro specific,  so going to this channel would make sense #linux
